lexUnit.name: consider.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: take facts into account in a reasoning process

sentence.text: Economists , the statistics profession , trade unions and Opposition politicians all pledged support for the idea of a national council which is being promoted by eminent statisticians and considered by the Royal Statistical Society .
